channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- wp-cart-for-digital-products
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- wp-cart-for-digital-products

item.title: CVE-2024-6074|2024-07-15T15:20:02.866Z -- unknown -- wp-cart-for-digital-products
item.description: The wp-cart-for-digital-products WordPress plugin before 8.5.5 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin

item.title: CVE-2024-6073|2024-07-15T13:27:34.759Z -- unknown -- wp-cart-for-digital-products
item.description: The wp-cart-for-digital-products WordPress plugin before 8.5.5 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin

item.title: CVE-2024-6074|2024-07-15T06:00:05.374Z -- unknown -- wp-cart-for-digital-products
item.description: The wp-cart-for-digital-products WordPress plugin before 8.5.5 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin

item.title: CVE-2024-6073|2024-07-15T06:00:04.974Z -- unknown -- wp-cart-for-digital-products
item.description: The wp-cart-for-digital-products WordPress plugin before 8.5.5 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin

item.title: CVE-2024-6075|2024-07-15T06:00:05.607Z -- unknown -- wp-cart-for-digital-products
item.description: The wp-cart-for-digital-products WordPress plugin before 8.5.5 does not have CSRF checks in some places, which could allow attackers to make logged in users perform unwanted actions via CSRF attacks

item.title: CVE-2024-6076|2024-07-15T06:00:05.868Z -- unknown -- wp-cart-for-digital-products
item.description: The wp-cart-for-digital-products WordPress plugin before 8.5.5 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin

item.title: CVE-2024-6072|2024-07-15T06:00:04.074Z -- unknown -- wp-cart-for-digital-products
item.description: The wp-cart-for-digital-products WordPress plugin before 8.5.5 does not escape the $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'] parameter before outputting it back in an attribute, which could lead to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting in old web browsers

item.title: CVE-2024-6075|2024-07-15T14:01:09.916Z -- unknown -- wp-cart-for-digital-products
item.description: The wp-cart-for-digital-products WordPress plugin before 8.5.5 does not have CSRF checks in some places, which could allow attackers to make logged in users perform unwanted actions via CSRF attacks
